comments: Ramanujan theta functions: f(q) := Prod_{k>=1} (1-(-q)^k) (see A121373), phi(q) := theta_3(q) := Sum_{k=-oo..oo} q^(k^2) (A000122), psi(q) := Sum_{k=0..oo} q^(k*(k+1)/2) (A010054), chi(q) := Prod_{k>=0} (1+q^(2k+1)) (A000700).
references: J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, "Sphere Packings, Lattices and Groups", Springer-Verlag, p. 120, Eq. 96.
links: N. J. A. Sloane, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..800
G. Nebe and N. J. A. Sloane, Home page for this lattice
M. Somos, Introduction to Ramanujan theta functions
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Ramanujan Theta Functions
formula: Theta series in terms of Jacobi theta series: (theta_2)^5 + (theta_3)^5.Expansion of phi(q^4)^5 + ( 2 * q * psi(q^8) )^5 in powers of q where phi(), psi() are Ramanujan theta functions. - _Michael Somos_, Sep 17 2007
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
